name: IOUserUSBHostHIDDevice
desc: A provider object for USB devices that support HID interactions.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the event service.

items.name: - Start
items.desc: Starts the current device service and associates it with the specified provider object.

items.name: - handleStart
items.desc: Performs any custom initialization associated with starting the device service.

items.name: - Stop
items.desc: Stops the device service associated with the specified provider.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the service.

items.name: - newDeviceDescription
items.desc: Creates and returns a new dictionary that describes the HID device.

items.name: - newReportDescriptor
items.desc: Returns the data in the HID device's report descriptor.

items.name: - getReport
items.desc: Gets a report from the HID device.

items.name: - setReport
items.desc: Sends a report to the HID device.

items.name: - initInputReport
items.desc: Starts reading the input report from the device.

items.name: - CompleteInputReport
items.desc: Processes the results of an asynchronous request for an input report.

items.name: - scheduleInputReportRetry
items.desc: Retries a previous request for an input report.

items.name: - cancelInputReportRetry
items.desc: Cancels a retry attempt for an input report request.

items.name: - TimerOccurred
items.desc: Handles timeout-related actions when retrying input report requests.

items.name: - setProtocol
items.desc: Sets the active protocol to use for communicating with the USB device.

items.name: - setIdlePolicy
items.desc: Sets the amount of idle time that must pass before suspending the device.

items.name: - setProperty
items.desc: Updates the specified property on the corresponding kernel object.
